attributes.action: Allow right of abode for immigrants from Australia and New Zealand
attributes.additional_details:
Our government was more than happy to allow people from Australian and New Zealand to fight and die alongside us during two world wars and many conflicts since, we have shared so much culture and history it seems absolutely shameful that they have less rights to stay here than people from the countries we fought side by side against.
Please right this wrong and allow an automatic right of abode for all people that recognize our Queen as head of state.
